term.title: interval analysis

item.text: A method to estimate uncertainties in the results of a least-squares procedure. The input data are primary values plus limits of intervals expressing their uncertainty. The output consists of derived values plus limits of intervals expressing a pessimistic estimate of maximal uncertainty.

sources.item: PAC, 1981, 53, 1805. 'Assignment and Presentation of Uncertainties of the Numerical Results of Thermodynamic Measurements' on page 1823 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198153091805)
